GXM.FeaturePopup¶

Extends
  • Ext.Panel
class GXM.FeaturePopup(config)¶

The class that is used to construct a GXM FeaturePopup.

Example Use¶

Sample code to create a GXM.FeaturePopup:

// create a lazily instanciated GXM.LayerList:
var featPopup = {
    xtype: 'gxm_featurepopup',
    // call with GXM.Map...
    map : gxmMap
};

Config Options¶

Configuration properties in addition to those listed for Ext.Panel.

centered

Boolean shall the popup be centered within the viewport? Also see the original documentation

Default is true.

feature

OpenLayers.Feature.Vector The feature this popup is about to derive its information from.

hideOnMaskTap

Boolean shall the popup hide when the surrounding mask is being tapped? Also see the original documentation

Default is true.

modal

Boolean shall the popup be modal? Also see the original documentation

Default is true.

styleHtmlContent

Boolean shall HTML content be styled when rendering content? Also see the original documentation

Default is true.

tpl

Ext.XTemplate The template used to render the popup content. If not provided, a rudimentary template is being used.
